headerEntries: The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 23, +15 to hit with spell attacks):

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.text: The dragon can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day, or 5/Day in Lair)
traits.text: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

multiAttack.text: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of (A) Spellcasting to cast Guiding Bolt (level 4 version) or (B) Weakening Breath.

attacks.name: Rend
attacks.text: Melee Attack Roll: +17 to hit, reach 15 ft. Hit: 19 (2d8 + 10) Slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) Fire damage.

special.name: Fire Breath
special.text: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 24, each creature in a 90-foot Cone . Failure: 71 (13d10) Fire damage. Success: Half damage.

special.name: Weakening Breath
special.text: Strength Saving Throw: DC 24, each creature that isn't currently affected by this breath in a 90-foot Cone . Failure: The target has Disadvantage on Strength-based D20 Test and subtracts 5 (1d10) from its damage rolls. It repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

special.name: Spellcasting
special.text: The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 24, +16 to hit with spell attacks): At will: Detect Magic, Guiding Bolt (level 4 version), Shapechange (Beast or Humanoid form only, no Temporary Hit Points gained from the spell, and no Concentration or Temporary Hit Points required to maintain the spell) 1/day each: Flame Strike (level 6 version), Word of Recall, Zone of Truth

actions.name: Banish
actions.text: Charisma Saving Throw: DC 24, one creature the dragon can see within 120 feet. Failure: 24 (7d6) Force damage, and the target has the Incapacitated condition and is transported to a harmless demiplane until the start of the dragon's next turn, at which point it reappears in an unoccupied space of the dragon's choice within 120 feet of the dragon. Failure or Success: The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Guiding Light
actions.text: The dragon uses Spellcasting to cast Guiding Bolt (level 4 version).

actions.name: Pounce
actions.text: The dragon moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Rend attack.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 24, +16 to hit with spell attacks):

will: Shapechange (Beast or Humanoid form only, no Temporary Hit Points gained from the spell, and no Concentration or Temporary Hit Points required to maintain the spell)

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.text: The dragon turtle can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Blessing of the Sea (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.text: If the dragon turtle would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit point total instead resets to 350 hit points, and it recharges its Steam Breath. Additionally, the dragon turtle can now use the options in the "Mythic Actions" section for 1 hour. Award a party an additional 62,000 XP (124,000 XP total) for defeating the dragon turtle after its Blessing of the Sea activates.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.text: If the dragon turtle fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.text: The dragon turtle doesn't require food or drink.

multiAttack.text: The dragon turtle makes one Bite or Tail attack and two Claw attacks.

attacks.name: Bite
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (1d12 + 9) piercing damage plus 13 (2d12) lightning damage.

attacks.name: Claw
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (2d8 + 9) slashing damage.

attacks.name: Tail
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (2d10 + 9) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 24 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

special.name: Steam Breath
special.text: The dragon turtle exhales steam in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 24 Constitution saving throw, taking 67 (15d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Being underwater doesn't grant resistance against this damage.

actions.name: Attack
actions.text: The dragon turtle makes one Claw or Tail attack.

actions.name: Move
actions.text: The dragon turtle moves up to its speed. If the dragon turtle is swimming, this movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

actions.name: Boiling Aura (Costs 3 Actions)
actions.text: The dragon turtle radiates intense heat. Until the start of the dragon turtle's next turn, whenever a creature starts its turn within 20 feet of the dragon turtle, that creature must succeed on a DC 24 Constitution saving throw or take 40 (9d8) fire damage. Being underwater doesn't grant resistance against this damage.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.text: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

multiAttack.text: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

attacks.name: Bite
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (2d10 + 10) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) fire damage.

attacks.name: Claw
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d6 + 10) slashing damage.

attacks.name: Tail
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (2d8 + 10) bludgeoning damage.

special.name: Frightful Presence
special.text: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a DC 21 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

special.name: Fire Breath
special.text: The dragon exhales fire in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 24 Dexterity saving throw, taking 91 (26d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Detect
actions.text: The dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

actions.name: Tail Attack
actions.text: The dragon makes a tail attack.

actions.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
actions.text: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet of the dragon must succeed on a DC 25 Dexterity saving throw or take 17 (2d6 + 10) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.text: If Zuggtmoy fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: Zuggtmoy has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

multiAttack.text: Zuggtmoy makes three Pseudopod attacks.

attacks.name: Pseudopod
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: ++13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) force damage plus 9 (2d8) poison damage.

special.name: Spellcasting
special.text: Zuggtmoy casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 22): At will: detect magic, locate animals or plants 3/day each: dispel magic, entangle, plant growth 1/day each: etherealness, teleport

bonusActions.name: Infestation Spores (3/Day)
bonusActions.text: Zuggtmoy releases spores that burst out in a cloud that fills a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on her, and it lingers for 1 minute. Any creature in the cloud when it appears, or that enters it later, must make a DC 19 Constitution saving throw. On a successful save, the creature can't be infected by these spores for 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature is infected with a disease called the spores of Zuggtmoy, which lasts until the creature is cured of the disease or dies. While infected in this way, the creature can't be reinfected, and it must repeat the saving throw at the end of every 24 hours, ending the infection on a success. On a failure, the infected creature's body is slowly taken over by fungal growth, and after three such failed saves, the creature dies and is reanimated as a spore servant if it's a type of creature that can be.

bonusActions.name: Mind Control Spores
bonusActions.text: Zuggtmoy releases spores that burst out in a cloud that fills a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on her, and it lingers for 1 minute. Humanoids and Beasts in the cloud when it appears, or that enter it later, must make a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw. On a successful save, a creature can't be infected by these spores for 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature is infected with a disease called the influence of Zuggtmoy for 24 hours. While infected in this way, the creature is charmed by her and can't be reinfected by these spores.

reactions.name: Protective Thrall
reactions.text: When Zuggtmoy is hit by an attack roll, one creature within 10 feet of her that is charmed by her is hit by the attack instead.

actions.name: Attack
actions.text: Zuggtmoy makes one Pseudopod attack.

actions.name: Exert Will
actions.text: One creature charmed by Zuggtmoy that she can see must use its reaction, if a available, to move up to its speed as she directs or to make one weapon attack against a target that she designates.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Zuggtmoy casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 22):

traits.name: Entropic Aura
traits.text: Each creature that is not a construct or undead that ends its turn within 15 feet of Ygorl takes 14 (4d6) necrotic damage.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.text: If Ygorl fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: Ygorl has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.text: Ygorl's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 23, +15 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: blight, blink, chaos bolt*, detect magic, fly, shield 3/day each: circle of death, enervation*, symbol (discord only) 2/day each: finger of death, harm, mental prison* 1/day each: power word kill, power word stun, symbol (death only), weird * Spell from Xanathar's Guide to Everything

multiAttack.text: Ygorl makes three attacks: two with its scythe, and one with its Entropic Touch.

attacks.name: Scythe
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 18 (2d10 + 7) slashing damage plus 19 (3d12) necrotic damage. Any creature reduced to 0 hit points by this attack dies, with its body and everything it is wearing and carrying, except magic items, exploding into a cloud of ash. The creature can be restored to life only by means of a wish spell.

attacks.name: Entropic Touch
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d8 + 7) necrotic damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 22 Constitution saving throw or gain one level of exhaustion.

special.name: Summon Slaadi
special.text: Ygorl summons 1d4 + 1 death slaadi. A summoned slaad appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of Ygorl, acts as an ally of Ygorl, and can't summon other slaadi. It remains for 1 minute, until it or Ygorl dies, or until Ygorl dismisses it as an action.

special.name: Teleport
special.text: Ygorl teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

actions.name: Scythe
actions.text: Ygorl makes one attack with its scythe.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.text: Ygorl uses its Teleport action.

actions.name: Call the Void (Costs 3 Actions)
actions.text: Each creature that is not a construct or undead within 30 feet of Ygorl must make a DC 22 Constitution saving throw against the lord of entropy's attempt to unmake life, taking 42 (12d6) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Ygorl then regains a number of hit points equal to half the total damage taken by all affected creatures.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Ygorl's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 23, +15 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
footerEntries: * Spell from Xanathar's Guide to Everything

traits.name: Aura of Madness
traits.text: Any creature (other than Undead or Constructs) that ends its turn within 10 feet of Ssendam must succeed on a DC 20 Charisma saving throw or be inflicted with a random short-term madness. If a creature succeeds against any madness ability of Ssendam's, they are immune to Ssendam's madness for 1 hour.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.text: If Ssendam fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: Ssendam has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.text: Ssendam's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Regeneration (Golden Amoeba Form Only)
traits.text: Ssendam regains 40 hit points at the start of her turn if she has at least 1 hit point.

multiAttack.text: Ssendam makes three attacks: one with her Touch of Madness and two with her Chaos Staff.

attacks.name: Touch of Madness
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) slashing damage plus 11 (2d10) necrotic damage. A target that fails a DC 20 Charisma saving throw is inflicted with a random short-term madness. If it is already mad, the existing madness is replaced with a random long-term madness.

attacks.name: Chaos Staff
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 11 (2d10) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 19 Constitution saving throw or have the stunned condition for 1 minute. The target may repeat the saving throw at the end of each of their turns, ending the effect on a success.

special.name: Summon Slaadi
special.text: Ssendam summons 1d4 + 1 death slaadi. A summoned slaad appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of Ssendam, acts as an ally of Ssendam, and can't summon other slaadi. It remains for 1 minute, until it or Ssendam dies, or until Ssendam dismisses it as an action.

special.name: Teleport
special.text: Ssendam magically teleports, along with any equipment she is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space she can see.

special.name: Spellcasting
special.text: Ssendam casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 23): At will: detect evil and good, detect magic, detect thoughts, dispel magic, fear, fly, mass suggestion, plane shift 2/day each: finger of death, flame strike 1/day each: power word kill, power word stun

bonusActions.name: Change Shape
bonusActions.text: Ssendam polymorphs into a Small or Medium-sized Humanoid, into a Small Aberration that looks like a golden amoeba, or back into this, her golden slaad form. Any equipment she is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. She reverts to her true form if she dies. Her statistics in the Humanoid forms, other than her size, are the same.

reactions.name: Amoeba
reactions.text: When damaged, Ssendam uses her reaction to activate Change Shape to transform into her golden amoeba form. Doing this reduces the damage to 0.

actions.name: Chaos Staff
actions.text: Ssendam makes one Chaos Staff attack.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.text: Ssendam uses her Teleport action.

actions.name: Subversion (Costs 2 Actions)
actions.text: Ssendam forces every creature suffering from madness within 60 feet of her to use their reaction to attack another creature within 5 feet of them.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Ssendam casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 23):

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (6/Day)
traits.text: If the scion fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The scion has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.text: The scion deals double damage to objects and structures.

multiAttack.text: The scion makes one Crystal Club attack and two Slam attacks, then uses Entombing Grasp if available. Alternatively, the scion makes two Runic Boulder attacks.

attacks.name: Crystal Club
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. Hit: 35 (4d12 + 9) bludgeoning damage. Hit or Miss: The scion can cause the club to flare with bright light, and the target must succeed on a DC 22 Constitution saving throw or take 18 (4d8) radiant damage and have the blinded condition until the start of the scion's next turn.

attacks.name: Slam
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 31 (4d10 + 9) force damage.

attacks.name: Runic Boulder
attacks.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (4d8 + 9) bludgeoning damage. Hit or Miss: The boulder explodes. The target and each creature within 30 feet of it must make a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 19 (3d12) force damage and has the prone condition. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

special.name: Entombing Grasp
special.text: The scion wreathes its hand in petrifying magic and touches one Huge or smaller creature it can see within 20 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a DC 24 Dexterity saving throw or take 28 (8d6) force damage and have the grappled condition (escape DC 19). At the start of the scion's next turn, if the target is still grappled, the target has the petrified condition.

bonusActions.name: Earth-Shaking Movement
bonusActions.text: The scion moves up to its speed and then sends a shock wave through the ground in a 60-foot radius circle centered on itself. Each creature on the ground in that area that is concentration must succeed on a DC 24 Constitution saving throw or lose concentration.

name: Kraken
languages: and Primordial but can't speak; telepathy 120 ft.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.text: The kraken can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day, or 5/Day in Lair)
traits.text: If the kraken fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.text: The kraken deals double damage to objects and structures.

multiAttack.text: The kraken makes two Tentacle attacks and uses Fling, Lightning Strike, or Swallow.

attacks.name: Tentacle
attacks.text: Melee Attack Roll: +17, reach 30 ft. Hit: 24 (4d6 + 10) Bludgeoning damage. The target has the Grappled condition (escape DC 20) from one of ten tentacles, and it has the Restrained condition until the grapple ends.

special.name: Fling
special.text: The kraken throws a Large or smaller creature Grappled by it to a space it can see within 60 feet of itself that isn't in the air. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 25, the creature thrown and each creature in the destination space. Failure: 18 (4d8) Bludgeoning damage, and the target has the Prone condition. Success: Half damage only.

special.name: Lightning Strike
special.text: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 23, one creature the kraken can see within 120 feet. Failure: 33 (6d10) Lightning damage. Success: Half damage.

special.name: Swallow
special.text: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 25, one creature Grappled by the kraken (it can have up to four creatures swallowed at a time). Failure: 23 (3d8 + 10) Piercing damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is swallowed and no longer Grappled. A swallowed creature has the Restrained condition, has Cover against attacks and other effects outside the kraken, and takes 24 (7d6) Acid damage at the start of each of its turns. If the kraken takes 50 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the kraken must succeed on a DC 25 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, each of which falls in a space within 10 feet of the kraken with the Prone condition. If the kraken dies, any swallowed creature no longer has the Restrained condition and can escape from the corpse using 15 feet of movement, exiting Prone.

actions.name: Storm Bolt
actions.text: The kraken uses Lightning Strike.

actions.name: Toxic Ink
actions.text: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 23, each creature in a 15-foot Emanation originating from the kraken while it is underwater. Failure: The target has the Blinded and Poisoned conditions until the end of the kraken's next turn. The kraken then moves up to its Speed. Failure or Success: The kraken can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.text: Kozilek can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Freedom of Movement
traits.text: Kozilek ignores , and magical effects can't reduce its speed or cause it to be restrained. It can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being grappled.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.text: Kozilek deals double damage to objects and structures.

multiAttack.text: Kozilek makes three tentacle attacks, each of which it can replace with one use of Fling.

attacks.name: Bite
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (3d8 + 10) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature grappled by Kozilek, that creature is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained, it has against attacks and other effects outside Kozilek, and it takes 42 (12d6) acid damage at the start of each of Kozilek's turns. If Kozilek takes 50 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, Kozilek must succeed on a DC 25 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of Kozilek. If Kozilek dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 15 feet of movement, exiting prone.

attacks.name: Tentacle
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d6 + 10) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 18). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained. Kozilek has ten tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

special.name: Fling
special.text: One Large or smaller object held or creature grappled by Kozilek is thrown up to 60 feet in a random direction and knocked prone. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked prone.

special.name: Lightning Storm
special.text: Kozilek magically creates three bolts of lightning, each of which can strike a target Kozilek can see within 120 feet of it. A target must make a DC 23 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Tentacle Attack or Fling
actions.text: Kozilek makes one tentacle attack or uses its Fling.

actions.name: Lightning Storm (Costs 2 Actions)
actions.text: Kozilek uses Lightning Storm.

actions.name: Ink Cloud (Costs 3 Actions)
actions.text: While underwater, Kozilek expels an ink cloud in a 60-foot radius. The cloud spreads around corners, and that area is heavily obscured to creatures other than Kozilek. Each creature other than Kozilek that ends its turn there must succeed on a DC 23 Constitution saving throw, taking 16 (3d10) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A strong current disperses the cloud, which otherwise disappears at the end of Kozilek's next turn.

traits.name: Foul
traits.text: Any creature other than an Ooze that starts its turn within 10 feet of Juiblex must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of the creature's next turn.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.text: If Juiblex fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: Juiblex has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.text: Juiblex regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes fire or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. Juiblex dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.text: Juiblex can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

multiAttack.text: Juiblex makes three Acid Lash attacks.

attacks.name: Acid Lash
attacks.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 60/120 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (4d6 + 7) acid damage. Any creature killed by this attack is drawn into Juiblex's body, where the corpse is dissolved after 1 minute.

special.name: Eject Slime
special.text: Juiblex spews out a corrosive slime, targeting one creature that it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw or take 55 (10d10) acid damage. Unless the target avoids taking all of this damage, any metal armor worn by the target takes a permanent −1 penalty to the AC it offers, and any metal weapon the target is carrying or wearing takes a permanent −1 penalty to damage rolls. The penalty worsens each time a target is subjected to this effect. If the penalty on an object drops to −5, the object is destroyed. The penalty on an object can be removed by the mending spell.

special.name: Spellcasting
special.text: Juiblex casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 20): At will: detect magic 3/day each: contagion, gaseous form

actions.name: Attack
actions.text: Juiblex makes one Acid Lash attack.

actions.name: Corrupting Touch (Costs 2 Actions)
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 21 (4d6 + 7) poison damage, and the target is slimed. Until the slime is scraped off with an action, the target is poisoned, and any creature, other than an Ooze, is poisoned while within 10 feet of the target.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Juiblex casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 20):

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.text: If Galazeth fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

multiAttack.text: Galazeth makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

attacks.name: Bite
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +15 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (1d10 + 8) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) lightning damage.

attacks.name: Claw
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (1d6 + 8) slashing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is knocked prone.

special.name: Dancing Elements Breath
special.text: Galazeth exhales a blast of flames and ice in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw, gaining no benefit from cover (other than ) and taking 38 (7d10) fire damage and 38 (7d10) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

special.name: Spellcasting
special.text: Galazeth casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 23): 1/day each: control water, gust of wind, wall of stone

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Galazeth makes one Claw attack.

actions.name: Lightning Flash (Costs 2 Actions)
actions.text: Galazeth moves up to half his flying speed without provoking opportunity attacks. When he passes within 15 feet of a creature during this move, that creature must succeed on a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw or take 11 (2d10) lightning damage. A creature can take this damage no more than once during the move.

actions.name: Flowing Creation (Costs 3 Actions)
actions.text: Galazeth magically summons 1d4 elemental mascots in unoccupied spaces he can see within 60 feet of himself. The art elementals obey his commands and take their turns immediately after his. Any creature, other than an art elemental, takes 5 (1d10) cold, fire, or lightning damage (Galazeth's choice) if it ends its turn within 5 feet of one or more of these elementals. When one of these elementals drops to 0 hit points, Galazeth can fly up to 20 feet without provoking opportunity attacks. These elementals disappear after 10 minutes, when Galazeth dies, or when he uses this action again.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Galazeth casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 23):

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.text: If Fraz-Urb'luu fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: Fraz-Urb'luu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Undetectable
traits.text: Fraz-Urb'luu can't be targeted by divination magic, perceived through magical scrying sensors, or detected by abilities that sense demons or Fiends.

multiAttack.text: Fraz-Urb'luu makes one Bite attack and two Fist attacks, and he uses Phantasmal Terror.

attacks.name: Bite
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (3d6 + 9) force damage.

attacks.name: Fist
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (3d8 + 9) force damage.

special.name: Phantasmal Terror
special.text: Fraz-Urb'luu targets one creature he can see within 120 feet of him. The target must succeed on a DC 23 Wisdom saving throw, or it takes 16 (3d10) psychic damage and is frightened of Fraz-Urb'luu until the end of its next turn.

special.name: Spellcasting
special.text: Fraz-Urb'luu casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 23): At will: alter self (can become Medium when changing his appearance), detect magic, dispel magic, phantasmal force 3/day each: mislead, programmed illusion, seeming 1/day each: modify memory, project image

actions.name: Tail
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (2d10 + 9) force damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is also grappled (escape DC 24), and it is restrained until the grapple ends. Fraz-Urb'luu can grapple only one creature with his tail at a time.

actions.name: Terror (Costs 2 Actions)
actions.text: Fraz-Urb'luu uses Phantasmal Terror.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Fraz-Urb'luu casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 23):

will: alter self (can become Medium when changing his appearance)

traits.name: Air Form
traits.text: The tempest can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Flyby
traits.text: The tempest doesn't provoke |opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.text: If the tempest fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Living Storm
traits.text: The tempest is always at the center of a storm 1d6 + 4 miles in diameter. Heavy precipitation in the form of either rain or snow falls there, causing the area to be lightly obscured. Heavy rain also extinguishes open flames and imposes disadvantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing. In addition, strong winds swirl in the area covered by the storm. The winds impose disadvantage on ranged attack rolls. They also extinguish open flames and disperse fog.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.text: The tempest deals double damage to objects and structures.

multiAttack.text: The tempest makes two Thunderous Slam attacks.

attacks.name: Thunderous Slam
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (4d6 + 9) thunder damage.

special.name: Lightning Storm
special.text: Each creature within 120 feet of the tempest must make a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 (6d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If a target's saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is also stunned until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Move
actions.text: The tempest moves up to its speed.

actions.name: Lightning Strike (Costs 2 Actions)
actions.text: The tempest can cause a bolt of lightning to strike a point on the ground anywhere under its storm. Each creature within 5 feet of that point must make a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw, taking 16 (3d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Screaming Gale (Costs 3 Actions)
actions.text: The tempest releases a blast of thunder and wind in a line that is 300 feet long and 20 feet wide. Objects in that area take 22 (4d10) thunder damage. Each creature there must succeed on a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw or take 22 (4d10) thunder damage and be flung up to 60 feet in a direction away from the line. If a thrown target collides with an immovable object (such as a wall or floor) or another creature, the target takes 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown before impact. If the target collides with another creature, that other creature must succeed on a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw or take the same impact damage and be knocked prone.

traits.name: Awakening of the Scion
traits.text: The cradle is a container for the scion of Skoraeus. When the cradle drops to 0 hit points, its body crumbles to dust. The scion instantly appears in the space the cradle occupied and uses the cradle's initiative count.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
traits.text: If the cradle fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The cradle has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.text: The cradle deals double damage to objects and structures.

multiAttack.text: The cradle makes two Slam or Spit Rock attacks.

attacks.name: Slam
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +15 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

attacks.name: Spit Rock
attacks.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +15 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 24 (3d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 23 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

special.name: Shattering Roar
special.text: The cradle lets out a painfully load roar. Each creature within 60 feet of the cradle must make a DC 23 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 33 (6d10) thunder damage and has the incapacitated condition until the end of its next turn.

bonusActions.name: Crystal Flare
bonusActions.text: The cradle causes the crystals on its body to flare with light. Each creature within 30 feet of the cradle must succeed on a DC 22 Constitution saving throw or take 21 (6d6) radiant damage and have the blinded condition until the end of the cradle's next turn.

bonusActions.name: Stone Spikes
bonusActions.text: The cradle causes the ground in a 20-foot square within 90 feet of itself to sprout crystal spikes until the start of its next turn. The area becomes difficult terrain for the duration. A creature takes 10 (3d6) piercing damage for each 5 feet it moves on this terrain.

name: Colossus of Akros
languages: understands Common and Celestial but can't speak

traits.name: Crumbling Destruction
traits.text: When the colossus drops to 0 hit points, it crumbles and is destroyed. Any creature on the ground within 30 feet of the crumbling statue must make a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) bludgeoning damage and 22 (4d10) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Fire Absorption
traits.text: Whenever the colossus is subjected to fire damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the fire damage dealt.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.text: The colossus is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.text: The colossus's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.text: The colossus deals double damage to objects and structures.

multiAttack.text: The colossus of Akros makes two melee attacks.

attacks.name: Spear
attacks.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 15 ft., or range 200/600 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (4d6 + 9) piercing damage, or 27 (4d8 + 9) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack. If the colossus makes a ranged attack with this spear, the spear magically returns to its hand after the attack.

attacks.name: Sword
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 36 (6d8 + 9) slashing damage.

special.name: Flames of Akros
special.text: Magical flames issue from the colossus toward up to three creatures the colossus can see within 90 feet of it. Each target must make a DC 24 Dexterity saving throw, taking 36 (8d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On a failed save, a target also magically catches fire for 1 minute. At the end of each of its turns thereafter, the burning target repeats the saving throw. It takes 18 (4d8) fire damage on a failed save, and the effect ends on a successful one.

traits.name: Astral Implosion
traits.text: If the blob is reduced to 0 Hit Points, it implodes and ejects any creatures and objects engulfed by it into the Astral Sea. The blob itself vanishes, leaving behind a layer of slime on everything that was within 600 feet of it. In 1d20 years, the blob reconstitutes on a random world in the Material Plane.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
traits.text: If the blob fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The blob has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

multiAttack.text: The blob makes two Pseudopod attacks and uses Engulf. It can replace one attack with a use of Restraining Glob.

attacks.name: Pseudopod
attacks.text: Melee Attack Roll: +15, reach 30 ft. Hit: 24 (3d10 + 8) Force damage.

special.name: Engulf
special.text: The blob moves up to its Speed and can move through the spaces of Huge or smaller creatures and objects. Strength Saving Throw: DC 23, each creature or object whose space the blob enters for the first time during this move. Failure: The target is engulfed. While engulfed, a target has Cover against attacks and other effects outside the blob, and when the blob moves, the engulfed target moves with it. A nonmagical object is destroyed after spending 1 minute engulfed. While engulfed, a creature takes 21 (6d6) Force damage at the start of each of its turns, is suffocating, has the Restrained condition, and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns. An engulfed creature that is reduced to 0 Hit Points dissolves into ash, which is ejected into the Astral Sea. Success: The target escapes and enters the nearest unoccupied space.

special.name: Restraining Glob
special.text: The blob lobs a slimy glob at one Large or smaller creature it can see within 600 feet of itself. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 23, the targeted creature. Failure: 18 (3d6 + 8) Acid damage. The glob rolls the target 60 feet straight toward the blob, and the target has the Restrained condition until the end of its next turn, when the glob harmlessly dissolves. Success: Half damage only.

actions.name: Decay
actions.text: The blob deals 14 (4d6) Necrotic damage to each creature engulfed by it. The blob can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Grasping Glob
actions.text: The blob uses Restraining Glob. The blob can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Lashing Goop
actions.text: The blob makes one Pseudopod attack.

traits.name: Labyrinthine Recall
traits.text: Baphomet can perfectly recall any path he has traveled, and he is immune to the maze spell.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.text: If Baphomet fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: Baphomet has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

multiAttack.text: Baphomet makes one Bite attack, one Gore attack, and one Heartcleaver attack. He also uses Frightful Presence.

attacks.name: Bite
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (2d8 + 10) piercing damage.

attacks.name: Gore
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d6 + 10) piercing damage. If Baphomet moved at least 10 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 16 (3d10) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 25 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked prone.

attacks.name: Heartcleaver
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (2d10 + 10) force damage.

special.name: Frightful Presence
special.text: Each creature of Baphomet's choice within 120 feet of him and aware of him must succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. These later saves have disadvantage if Baphomet is within line of sight of the creature. If a creature succeeds on any of these saves or the effect ends on it, the creature is immune to Baphomet's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

special.name: Spellcasting
special.text: Baphomet casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 18): once per day: teleport 3/day each: dispel magic, dominate beast, maze, wall of stone

actions.name: Heartcleaver Attack
actions.text: Baphomet makes one Heartcleaver attack.

actions.name: Charge (Costs 2 Actions)
actions.text: Baphomet moves up to his speed without provoking |opportunity attacks, then makes a Gore attack.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day, or 5/Day in Lair)
traits.text: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

multiAttack.text: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of (A) Paralyzing Breath or (B) Spellcasting to cast Ice Knife (level 2 version).

attacks.name: Rend
attacks.text: Melee Attack Roll: +17, reach 15 ft. Hit: 19 (2d8 + 10) Slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) Cold damage.

special.name: Cold Breath
special.text: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 24, each creature in a 90-foot Cone . Failure: 67 (15d8) Cold damage. Success: Half damage.

special.name: Paralyzing Breath
special.text: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 24, each creature in a 90-foot Cone . First Failure: The target has the Incapacitated condition until the end of its next turn, when it repeats the save. Second Failure: The target has the Paralyzed condition, and it repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

special.name: Spellcasting
special.text: The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 23, +15 to hit with spell attacks): At will: Detect Magic, Hold Monster, Ice Knife (level 2 version), Shapechange (Beast or Humanoid form only, no Temporary Hit Points gained from the spell, and no Concentration or Temporary Hit Points required to maintain the spell) 1/day each: Control Weather, Ice Storm (level 7 version), Teleport, Zone of Truth

actions.name: Chill
actions.text: The dragon uses Spellcasting to cast Hold Monster. The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Cold Gale
actions.text: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 23, each creature in a 60-foot-long, 10-foot-wide Line . Failure: 14 (4d6) Cold damage, and the target is pushed up to 30 feet straight away from the dragon. Success: Half damage only. Failure or Success: The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Pounce
actions.text: The dragon moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Rend attack.
